title: ... anybody, eh, know this font?
content:
Copied from my employers data, he lost the original font and wants me to use ita as a logo sign. Would be a great help. Thanx!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905123032im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_request_1_5327.jpg)

 [‹ ID this typeface - it seems like an easy one - but I'm stumped](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905123032/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43470 "Go to previous forum topic") [Does anyone know this font!!!! Very difficult!!! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905123032/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43461 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jazzyourazz

comments.content:
Hi Alex, you could check out the FF Instant Types package on Fontshop. There should a couple of faces that come quite close.

-  
Arun
